alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:20PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima County through 1000 PM MST... At 919 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Tucson, or near Tucson, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, South Tucson, Saguaro National Park West, Tucson Estates, Catalina Foothills and Valencia West. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 251 and 265. Interstate 19 between mile markers 58 and 63. Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 75. Route 86 between mile markers 165 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
